channel.title: Wild/safe! ANSWER NOW PLEASE!
channel.description:
Hello, I need help. Im gonna make a new ''home'' on my server and whole place is wild.. Can I change it into safe in a easy way or do I have to make one line per square.. And is it possible to change whole world into safe and then choose my wild areas? PLease, reply as fast as possible.. If you know any link to guide, POST IT!
Thanks ~ Extoz.

item.title: Wild/safe! ANSWER NOW PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @nozirev nozirev
item.description:
@nozirev wrote:

Safe zones : Go into client.java and search for boolean nOnwild , and there you will see certain coordinates which are safe zones.

Read full topic
